title: Cotton Stocks, Total Domestic and Foreign for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Seven Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1869-1881 (2)--Original Data, 1880-1890 (3)--Original Data, 1889-1903 (4)--Original Data, 1902-1916 (5)--Original Data, 1915-1928 (6)--Original Data, 1927-1941 (7)--Original Data, 1946-1957. Data Refer To The End Of The Month For 1946-1949; For 1950-1957, To The Saturday Nearest The End Of The Month Or Beginning Of The Following Month. Source: Survey Of Current Business, 1949-1953 Statistical Supplements And Monthly Issues Beginning With Issue Of July 1953

This NBER data series m05003g appears on the NBER website in Chapter 5 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter05.html.

NBER Indicator: m05003g
